roleset.name: beginning, origination
roleset.note: INCEPT-V NOTES: Added by Julia for unification.
INCEPTION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from inception.01-n)

example.name: incept-v
example.text: This was the room where-1 the idea was incepted *T*-1.

example.name: inception-n: with agent
example.text: Thus, 9 years after their inception of the program, Garfinkle and Klawitter (1992) reluctantly conclude that "routine income withholding will increase child support payment by only a modest amount ... it is no panacea" (p.248).

example.name: inception-n: args 1, 2
example.text: Pastor Lindsey Williams, former minister to the global oil companies during the building of the Alaskan pipeline, announced the most significant event to affect the U.S. dollar since its inception as a currency.

roleset.name: graduate from a university
roleset.note: INCEPT-V NOTES: Added by Julia for unification.
INCEPTION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT. No VNcls. (from inception.01-n)

example.name: incept-v
example.text: A certain monk of Walden named Simon, having drunk deep at the fount of ecclesiastical learning, incepted at the university of Cambridge and taught canon law.
example.arg: A certain monk of Walden named Simon
having drunk deep at the fount of ecclesiastical learning
